data.title: RuPaul's DragCon UK 2025
data.meta_description: 10 & 11 January 2025, the official convention for the Drag Race fan.
data.text:
Talent and programming announcements coming soon!

SEE WHO'S COMING

FIND YOUR TRIBE

The most sickening shopping experience at your fingertips. Find everything you need and everything you didn’t know you need.

SHOP BRANDS AS UNIQUE AS YOU ARE

Welcome to ‘the most inclusive party on earth’. Connect with drag fans, artists and people just like you from around the globe!

WOWPP - watch content from previous DragCons

BBMG etc

The most inclusive party on earth - a safe place to laugh, dance and celebrate every color of the rainbow.

RuPaul

"

"

DragCon attracts all walks of life, from the very young to the old, individuals are drawn to the swirl of color, opulence and activity that goes part and parcel with drag performances.

"

DragCon is a space built out of the love of the drag and queer community.

SHOP DRAGCON

If you stay ready, you ain't got to get ready.

Title About Videos / WOWPP

Check out some of the amazing performances from past DragCons.

BE THERE FOR IT ALL

AFTER HOURS PARTIES

Don't miss these separately ticket events, happening on the DragCon Main Stage outside of regular show hours on Friday and Saturday night!

After Hours parties are 16+

FOLLOW DRAGCON

For all press or media requests, email

wow@metropublicrelations.com

For LA press or media requests, fill out this form.Or email wow@metropublicrelations.com

For UK press or media requests, reach out to DragCon@organic-publicity.com

SEE WHO'S COMINGSEE WHO'S COMING

The largest gathering of Drag Race queens and fans in the world.

From the screen to the showfloor.

Meet and greets(minimum purchase typically required), exclusive merch, and more right with the queens at their booths.

MEET YOUR ICONS

GET TICKETS

Witness drag excellence with non-stop performances from the stars of RuPaul’s Drag Race all weekend long.

MAIN STAGE

LIVE TAPINGS

You are cordially invited to the Met Gala of drag. Don’t miss this iconic event that kicks off the show Friday morning.

THE QUEENS WALK

MEET YOUR ICONS

From the screen to the showfloor.

Buy meet and greets, exclusive merch items and more right with the queens at their booths.
